newsitem.title: UK: Rothschild group raises profits sharply.
newsitem.headline: Rothschild group raises profits sharply.

text.p: Rothschild Continuation Holdings AG (RCH), parent of merchant banking group NM Rothschild, on Tuesday announced its results for the first time, showing an operating profit of 179 million Swiss francs for the year to March 31.
The figure was 66 percent higher than the 108 million Swiss francs posted for the previous year.
Within the results, the group said total operating income at the UK's NM Rothschild and Sons Ltd rose to 124.2 million stg from 119.8 million the previous year.

"This is an excellent set of results from our operating subsidiaries around the world," said RCH chairman Sir Evelyn de Rothschild, "with particularly strong performances from our investment banking and private banking businesses as well as increased profitability from operations in Asia Pacific and North America."
Rothschild said the figures also reflected the depreciation of the Swiss franc against the bank's major operating currencies.
